TopicTitle: Handy DV, TWR and orbital velocity Calc 1.0

Articles.Content:
Hi Guys,

built a calculator to help with various tasks, it is a work in progress but already very help full thought I would share it with you?

https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B78wUPhJdxiEaHBiMlJYZi02clU/edit?usp=sharing
That's nice, but we already have tools like Mechjeb and Kerbal engineer to do in ingame.
Hey, i like it. I try to play with an un-modded game, so having things like this is useful.

Hey, i like it. I try to play with an un-modded game, so having things like this is useful.

Same here, the only think I'm allowing was the adding/changing flags and Kerbal names (Jeb, Bob, & Bill stayed, and are the only orange suits though). Although I really want to mess around with that Kethane Mod after career perhaps.

To the OP, thanks!
